mapper.insert:
insert into item
id, title,
sell_point,
price, num,
barcode,
image,
cid, status, created, updated,
values
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{sellPoint,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{price,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.delete: update item set yn=1 where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
